Text: Re kWh to MWh problem Resolved Cc po Thank you for the follow up I suggest that Evan Hughes work with Murray to sort through the appropriate process check points CSC settlements EPMI and to respond to the CAISO Thanks Dan From Tim nronXgate on PM To Dan ES Janet R ES John J nronXgate Don ES Murray P nronXgate Richard B CT Christian nronXgate cc Subject kWh to MWh problem Resolved We do not have to pay the ISO the million They will estimate what we should owe them and bill us for that amount They also want to make sure that we have remedied the problem Murray ONeil will be the point person with the ISO Who will be the lead within the EES Settlements organization to ensure that we adequately remedy this problem That person should work with Murray to craft a response to the CAISO Regard Tim Original Message From ONeil Murray P Sent Thursday May PM To Belden Tim Subject FW Dispute Trade Dates Importance High Tim GOOD NEWS This is the response from the ISO We are being requested to provide them with detail explanations behind the generation of bad meter data If you have any questions please let me know Thanks MO Original Message From Almeida Keoni mailtoENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESAlmeidaCKeoniCKAlmeidacaisoEcomE NRONcom mailtomailtoIMCEANOTESAlmeidaCKeoniCKAlmeidacaisoEcomE NRONcom Sent Thursday May PM To ONeil Murray P Stokley Chris Johnson Donna Subject FW Dispute Trade Dates Importance High Good news See email below Epstein is our Controller Spence is our Director of Settlements Bill Regan is our Chief Financial Officer On another note it has been requested that a detailed explanation be given and what will be done to prevent this in the future I hope you can understand the reasoning for this request Keoni Almeida California Independent System Operator phone pager alpha page mailto email mailto Original Message From Epstein Michael Sent Thursday May PM To Gerber Spence Woertz Byron Almeida Keoni Nelsen Deanne Cc Perez Glen Regan William Iverson Melodie Subject RE Dispute Trade Dates Importance High The ISO would like Enron to pay the net amount after Spence has made his estimate of the corrected bill We will not be able to tell Enron the amount until early next week Keoni needs to inform Enron to pay the adjusted amount when Spences estimate is complete
